ul.li: Fixed the issue that the SIP trunk advanced settings would be lost after upgrading the PBX.

li.p: Fixed the Allow Mode for SIP Forking issue: If Allow Mode for SIP Forking setting was enabled, a system hang would occur when a ring group member performed a blind transfer to another user.

ul.li: Fixed registration issue on SIP trunk: PBX IP might be blocked by the VoIP provider if PBX sent a mass of REGISTER packets to retry register SIP trunk after the first registration failure.
